website_summaries.verdict: Alienware's mid-size Aurora is very flexible, and one of the smallest dual-GPU-ready gaming desktops, but it's still going to hog a lot of floor space under your desk.
pros: The Alienware Aurora can fit two graphics cards into a relatively small case
Interior access doesn't require a screwdriver, and future GPU upgrades should be easy
cons: This is still big and heavy for a mid-size gaming desktop, some components are hidden behind the power supply, and some of the latest highest-end component options aren't available yet

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION: Don't buy this from this vendor
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase from this vendor. I purchased this desktop for my son and in the product details, it says that the graphics Coprocessor is a NVIDIA GTX 1070. We noticed that the desktop was not running at the frames that it should for gaming. When we check the computer it says that the graphics coprocessor is actually a GTX 750. Now, the vendor isn't helping. Dell isn't me and Amazon is pushing the issue to the manufacturer. Normally, Amazon is great, but I am very frustrated and disappointed with how this is being handled.
customer_reviews.author: Yours Truly

customer_reviews.title: This computer will chew up pretty much any game currently released
customer_reviews.text: This computer will chew up pretty much any game currently released, and will continue to do so for quite some time. One couldn't build a similar rig for much less (1539.99$ (at the time of purchase)). There are rigs with better specs and hardware, but you really won't need them for gaming unless you want 8k everything (you know, for all two of the games that support that). The only drawback is the SSD is a bit small, but the wonderful thing about desktop computers is they're expandable.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great for the 2 months it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer feb/8/2017. Worked well for about two months now. Out of no where mid game my whole computer freezes then crashes. So I try to reboot and get an error, I google the error and get it fixed. Once I get it up and running I realize that it won't pick up my monitor unless I plug it in with hdmi. I also now realize I can not access my SSD at all. Fun while it lasted $1600 wasted. Update: I got ahold on dell and sent the computer in to be fixed... apperantly it was a motherboard crash! Will keep you all posted on how it is when it gets back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it still it!
customer_reviews.text: 1 year Has been an amazing computer. The computer is gorgeous. Super fast. Oculus works great on it. Wish I had another HDMI out, but I knew that going into this. Setup was a breeze. Fast to boot, Fast browsing, fast games, fast fast fast. Oculus had some issues with some Windows updates in the beginning, but no issues now. I do not regret this decision one bit. I did get this for $1200 on an Amazon lightning deal, but no one compensated me for the this amazing review!
customer_reviews.author: DIYPowerUp

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming computer
customer_reviews.text: Great computer! It is incredibly quiet and runs 2 MMOs at once smoothly and without lag. A couple of heads up about this computer. The C drive is very very tiny. Put all your games on the D drive. My computer came with a corrupted Windows 10 however the nice and knowledgeable (thank god) people at Alienware knew exactly what was wrong with it and helped me get it fixed quickly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Not liquid cooled
customer_reviews.text: The sales page mentions liquid cooling multiple times and even features it on the manufacture info. However, the PC I got was NOT liquid-cooled. this was not made clear on the page at all and I specifically bought this PC because I wanted to get into the liquid-cooled PC game. Over the PC works well and does everything I need it to. but I feel that I was misled by the lack of liquid cooling and no obvious statement anywhere on the page telling me the PC I was buying would NOT be.
customer_reviews.author: Rolling Hedgehog

customer_reviews.title: But it's an amazing pc I love
customer_reviews.text: This is for those who wanna know how many monitors you wanna connect it has but one HDMI slot. Don't get lied too. But it's an amazing pc I love it
customer_reviews.author: it was Amazing

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming machine
customer_reviews.text: Great gaming machine! Running all the latest (2017) games at ultra with no issues. SS hard drive is great for super fast load times, and 2 TB drive holds vast amounts of data. Easy to upgrade. Best rig I've purchased in my 40 years of pc gaming. Pricey, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Super satisfied with this machine
customer_reviews.text: Super satisfied with this machine! Simply love it. Alienware machines are amazing that come with max performance optimization. Unless you into building your own rig, this is as good as it gets for performance, reliability and looks.
customer_reviews.author: Sashko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good computer...beautiful and quiet! Very satisfied with the purchase! Recommend a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: way faster and better than anything I owned previously and it's my dreamware
customer_reviews.text: Loving it, way faster and better than anything I owned previously and it's my dreamware.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Rayley

customer_reviews.title: Very fast boot and great graphics. I'll never be able to fill up ...
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. Very fast boot and great graphics. I'll never be able to fill up the hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Skidmore

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the product and the price
customer_reviews.text: Lovely PC, it's all I need. I'm very happy with the product and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing at best. Had problems with it waking from day one
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing at best. Had problems with it waking from day one. Had to re-boot to get it to wake. Now, 3 months in and the mouse and keyboard have failed. Am having to send it to Dell for repairs. Mkaing things worse, efforts to repair the machine by Alienwares technical support came from an individual whose dialect I could not understand. Not their fault, but would like to have a person that I could understand when trying to make repairs. Alas, unable to perform repairs on the machine despite their technical efforts.
customer_reviews.author: Sonictest

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Great computer. Got it for gaming. Design looks pretty cool with blue lights. I'd give it 5 stars but case computer came with a small scratch on side and a little chip off the front of case. Irritated me for about a week but after a while I forgot about it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Love this PC
customer_reviews.text: Love this PC, just got it a few days ago and its run smoothly ever since i started it up. Great price for a great PC.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Best price I found was at Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This was for my son and he loves it. Power supply may need upgrading to higher wattage, but for now, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: BullDawg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome computer, wont buy from any other company again
customer_reviews.text: So far it is a great computer, still getting used to Windows 10, used to Windows 7 so it's a learning curve with Windows 10. Have not had any issues with lag from any of the high graphics games played on the computer
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hawley

customer_reviews.title: ... a chance to test everything yet but it is super fast and super quiet
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to test everything yet but it is super fast and super quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the box looks old but the pc inside looks new.
customer_reviews.text: its not so good,like what u see. i run this pc with league of lenged with high video. The fps is between 110-200. when i star to steam it.the fps went to 30-90.that was unposible with this kind of pc.Anyway i return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Having a few issues with it cutting off/rebooting whenever it ...
customer_reviews.text: Having a few issues with it cutting off/rebooting whenever it likes and freezing at times. Other than that it's okay
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't even play heroes of the storm on medium settings.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent computer. Runs anything you need it to on ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent computer. Runs anything you need it to on ultra and 60fps at 1920x1080 resolution. I absolutely love this computer. You would spend about as much or more building your own computer of this caliber, plus alienware has stellar customer service. On top of that NVIDIA will give you ghost recon wildlands or for honor for free with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Out of the box, I am running 3 monitors which include a 4k Samsung, a 23" Cintiq HD and and Oculus Rift. There is no slowdown on any and the computer handles all VR games I've tried smooth as silk. The great thing is that the Aur5 is also incredibly easy to upgrade so if I need more power that's easy to make happen. Within the next month I'll be upgrading the hard drive space to add a few TB and also bringing the RAM up to 64gb. Other than that, it's all good. Bluetooth, wi-fi, sound, video, graphics, processing power... so far all is great. Looks nice too. Subtle lighting but still slick.
customer_reviews.author: sue boyd

customer_reviews.title: I really love this machine
customer_reviews.text: I really love this machine. Have had no issues with it and games perfectly. games like pubg, csgo, rocket league, all play perfectly with great fps. Would 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn R. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This Alienware died after 6 months. Unable to turn on, dead motherboard and processor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alienware AUR5 performance is indeed very good, but the price and the official website than ...
customer_reviews.text: Alienware AUR5 performance is indeed very good, but the price and the official website than Dell.com, the price is still very high, plus membership will be 5% rebate is very cost-effective. If the United States Amazon can properly reduce the price, I would choose to buy. [...]
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
